features: 【PROTECTS YOUR ELECTRIC STOVE 】- Away from scratching, water, dust, dirt, spills and glass carcking. It can also used as counter top mat, washer top cover. A nice decor for kitchen!
【EASY TO CLEAN＆STORE】 - Can be cleaned up with either hand or dishwasher. Then you can easily fold the sheet into roll or just hang it up on the hanging hook.
【HEAT RESISTANT to 120°C/248°F】 - This electric stove protector is very soft and heat resistant (but don't wear it with the stove on, as it can only withstand 120°/248°F)

【EXTRA COUNTER SPACE】 - Glass Top Cover makes it possible help you save every necessory working surface in the kitchen, you can prepare ingredients on the surface of the stove cover, or provide temporary table activity space to make you more comfortable in the kitchen.small kitchen deserves it more!

【NOTE&AFTER SALES】 - Please MAKE SURE the stove COOLS DOWN before putting the stove cover on. bcos this electric stove protection mat is made of fabric cloth and rubber, the stove protector may melt on your stove top or cause other issues. Any problems please kindly contact our customer service team, we promise satisfactory service for every customer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STOVE TOP COVERS FOR ELECTRIC STOVE Do not cook on the stove top cover. Ensure the stove is off before covering the stove cover. Do not turn the stove on when the stove protector is on it. Do not use this ironing mat as an iron rest station. Do not leave the iron on the cover.
Please measure your stove top before placing an order. Function： This electric stove top covers can protect the glass surface of your electric stove/washer/dryer/or other appliances from scratches

Foldable&Dishwasher Safe Just bend it to fit a dishwasher rack, or just wipe the cooktop lid with a damp cloth. Easy to Clean/Reusable Stove Gap Cover Simply bend it to fit in the dishwasher rack or just wipe the cooktop cover with a wet cloth. Anti-slip Coating The back of the electric stove cover is anti-slip design, which can be well fixed in the original position during use and will not slide.

Multifunctional - Electric Stove Top Cover, Glass Top Cover, Washer Dryer Countertop Protector/Glass Top Classic Black - This stove accessory looks like a natural part of the kitchen, adding modern style and functionality. Protects Stove top - Protects your stove top from scratches, scuffs, glass cracks or accidental touches on the touch control buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this mat!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this thing!! I got a new induction/convection range and I did not want to scratch the glass so I figured I would be proactive and take care of it. I also use my cooktop to rest things on when not in use.... This is like a huge mousepad for your cooktop. It comes with hangers and 2 loops, but I will never use them. I just cooked and folded it over to the left side so the front right burner was ready. It comes with 2 black silicone gap covers which I was thinking about getting anyway so one less order with this kit!About this being 'heat resistant," I can't test that as induction cooktops don't get hot like that at all. Warm, yes; but not hot. I was looking at silicone cooktop covers too, but for this size they usually come folded and the creases never come out. While this was folded, the bump is small (I wouldn't call it a crease) and it does not look to be permanent. I can certainly live with it if I had to, but it does look like it will flatten.Best feature is that is does not have some goofy name painted on it to make my kitchen look cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my stove looking neat & clean!
reviews.reviewText: Had a kitchen remodel this year and the contractors recommended stove guards to keep food from falling down the sides. This purchase included the top mat for about the same price as others so I bought it. Makes everything look so nice and clean. Definitely recommend. I'm extremely happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, didn’t know these were a thing!
reviews.reviewText: I love this protection for my glass stove. I appreciate having the added “counter” space. The graphic makes it a fun item to have. The hooks included hold my mat securely while I use my stove top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I am returning.
reviews.reviewText: I did not realize that it was not a metal cover and that is what I would prefer. Passing it on.
